00004 #ifndef DISTRIBUTIONMANAGER_H
00005 #define DISTRIBUTIONMANAGER_H
00006 
00007 #include <fstream>
00008 
00009 #include "Error.h"
00010 #include "RandomGenerator.h"
00011 
00012

00015 // DistributionManager mother class definition
00017 
00018 struct DistributionManager {
00019     virtual double generate_value() = 0;
00020 };
00021 
00022 
00023 
00025 // DeltaDistribution class definition
00026 // generates values equal to the value
00028 
00029 class DeltaDistribution
00030         : public DistributionManager
00031 {
00032 public:
00033     DeltaDistribution(std::ifstream & is);
00034     double generate_value() {
00035         return value_;
00036     }
00037 protected:
00038     double value_;
00039 };
00040 
00041 
00042 
00044 // UniformDistribution class definition
00045 // generates values uniformly distributed in [mean - spread, mean + spread]
00047 
00048 class UniformDistribution
00049         : public DistributionManager
00050 {
00051 public:
00052     UniformDistribution(double mean, double spread) : mean_(mean), spread_(spread) {}
00053     UniformDistribution(std::ifstream & is);
00054     double generate_value() {
00055         return mean_ - spread_ + 2 * spread_ * RandomGenerator::dran(1.);
00056     }
00057 protected:
00058     double mean_, spread_;
00059 };
00060 
00061 
00062 
00064 // BimodalDistribution class definition
00065 // return a_ with probability proba_ and b_ with (1-proba_)
00067 
00068 class BimodalDistribution
00069         : public DistributionManager
00070 {
00071 public:
00072     BimodalDistribution(std::ifstream & is);
00073     double generate_value() {
00074         return (RandomGenerator::dran(1.) < proba_) ? a_ : b_;
00075     }
00076 protected:
00077     double a_, b_, proba_;
00078 };
00079 
00080 
00081 
00083 // GaussianDistribution class definition
00084 // generates values gaussianly distributed around the mean with the given variance
00086 
00087 class GaussianDistribution
00088         : public DistributionManager
00089 {
00090 public:
00091     GaussianDistribution(std::ifstream & is);
00092     double generate_value() {
00093         return mean_ + RandomGenerator::gran(variance_);
00094     }
00095 protected:
00096     double mean_, variance_;
00097 };
